Flow.description: Flow to guide users through narrative and deck process

formulas.description: Sets status to in progress, unless it's already complete, in which case stays complete
formulas.name: dataAnalysisStatus

Flow.label: Advice | Generic | Orchestrator

fields.name: adviserDebrief
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed to confirm that you have completed the debrief.

fields.name: explain
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Choose the planner and click complete task to trigger the next steps.

fields.name: Suitability_planner
fields.fieldText: Suitability planner

fields.name: CatchUpCallBookingChasePrompt
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed when you have an update on chasing the annual review catch up call.

fields.name: BookingEmailChasedStatus
fields.fieldText: Annual review catch up status

fields.name: TaskDueDateNewChaser
fields.fieldText: When should the task be pushed to?

screens.name: Catch_up_call_booking_email_sent
screens.label: Catch up call booking email sent

fields.name: ConfirmAnnualReviewCatchUpCallBooking
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed when you have sent the annual review catch up call booking email.

fields.name: BookingEmailSentConfirm
fields.fieldText: Booking email sent

fields.name: setupTask
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Complete the sections below.

fields.name: New_advice_name
fields.fieldText: New advice name

fields.name: Opening_narrative
fields.fieldText: Opening narrative

fields.name: profileDisplay
fields.fieldText: This household currently has a profile status of: {!advice.Advice_Household__r.Profile_Status__c}.

fields.name: Does_this_advice_require_a_profile_update
fields.fieldText: Does this advice require a profile update?

fields.name: Does_this_advice_need_new_LOAs
fields.fieldText: Does this advice need new LOAs?

fields.name: Outstanding_information
fields.fieldText: Outstanding information
fields.helpText: Outstanding information to be obtained on the catch up call

fields.name: recConfirm
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed to update the recommendations.

fields.name: deckComp
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Please click next to submit the deck for peer review.

fields.name: Copy_2_of_ConfirmComplete
fields.fieldText:
Error:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

{!errorMessage}

fields.name: Question
fields.fieldText: Do you need the manage household flow again?

fields.name: meetingScreen
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed to confirm that you have booked the advice meeting.

fields.name: SuitabilityMeetingDateTime
fields.fieldText: Suitability meeting date/time

fields.name: AnnualReview
fields.fieldText: {!task.Subject}

fields.name: OnboardingAdviceHappened
fields.fieldText: Click next to confirm that the risk call is complete. You'll then be prompted to update vulnerability & conflict of interest for all people in this household.

fields.name: CatchUpCallTookPlace
fields.fieldText: Did the catch up call take place?

fields.name: RiskCallDate
fields.fieldText: Risk/catch up call date

fields.name: RiskCallDateMessage
fields.fieldText: Risk/catch up call date is required. Get this booked with Calendly or add it using the event button below.

fields.name: RetirementCallPresented
fields.fieldText: Did you present the retirement call content?

fields.name: RetirementCallFactsAdded
fields.fieldText: I have added retirement call facts

fields.name: VulnerabilityUpdate
fields.fieldText: Update vulnerability and conflict of interest?

fields.name: modellingcomp
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Click next to confirm that the illustrations and modelling have been completed. A task to four eye the modelling will be generated.

fields.name: Does_the_modelling_require_review
fields.fieldText: Does the modelling require review?

fields.name: confirmNarrative
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Click next to confirm that the suitability narrative is complete. The next task will be to create the recommendations.

fields.name: Snapshot_taken
fields.fieldText: Snapshot taken?

validationRule.errorMessage: You must ensure a snapshot has been taken

fields.name: NoTaskMessage
fields.fieldText: No orchestration tasks for you to complete here, though you might have some in the list below or need to refresh to have your task appear here.

fields.name: updatesNeededPartnerdeck
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Ensure any comments have been added to the deck before completing this task.

fields.name: DeckUpdatesNeededPartner
fields.fieldText: Are there any updates needed?

fields.name: Confirm_that_comments_have_been_added_to_the_deck
fields.fieldText: Confirm that comments have been added to the deck

fields.name: nonPresented
fields.fieldText: This advice has been marked as {!presentationMethod}. If this isn't correct, please add this as a comment in your review and indicate that updates are needed.

fields.name: nextTaskPartnerDeckReviewDisplay
fields.fieldText: The next task that will generate is {!nextTaskPartnerDeckReview}.

fields.name: ConfirmCompleteNarrativeReviewPartner
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Review the narrative on the advice checklist then click complete task when done.

fields.name: ChangesRequiredPartnerNarrative
fields.fieldText: Are any changes required?

fields.name: Notes
fields.fieldText: Notes

fields.name: ConfirmCompleteDeckReviewPlanner
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Provide comments on the advice checklist and indicate whether this should be returned to the suitability planner.

fields.name: DeckUpdatesNeededPlanner
fields.fieldText: Are any changes needed?

fields.name: ConfirmCompleteNarrativeReviewPlanner
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Click next to confirm that the planner review has been completed.

fields.name: narrativeUpdatesPlanner
fields.fieldText: Are any changes required?

fields.name: Review_comments
fields.fieldText: Review comments

fields.name: researchComp
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Click next to confirm that the product research has been completed. The next task will be to create the deck.

fields.name: PushText
fields.fieldText: This advice is still in the data gathering process. If you'd like to skip to data analysis, click the button below.

fields.name: PushTextDataAnalysis
fields.fieldText: This advice is still in the data analysis process. If you'd like to skip to suitability, click the button below.

fields.name: confirmrecs
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Click next to confirm that the recommendations have been created. The next task will be the planner review.

fields.name: ConfirmCompleteNarrativeResolvePartnerComments
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Click next to confirm that you have resolved all comments on the narrative and move along to illustrations and modelling.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ConfirmCompleteNarrativeResolvePartnerComments
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed to confirm you have resolved the comments and completed the deck.

fields.name: RetirementCallPrompt
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed to confirm the retirement call has taken place.

fields.name: PresentedRetirementCallFollowUp
fields.fieldText: Did you present the retirement call content?

fields.name: RetirementCallDate
fields.fieldText: When did the retirement call take place?

validationRule.errorMessage: Cannot be in the future

fields.name: RetirementCallFactsAddedFollowUp
fields.fieldText: I have added retirement call facts

fields.name: RetirementDeckComplete
fields.fieldText: {!task.Subject}

fields.name: RetirementCallRequired
fields.fieldText: Is a retirement call required?

fields.name: RetirementCallPushUntil
fields.fieldText: Will this client ever need a retirement call?
fields.helpText: Is it just that we won't do a retirement call this year? Or do the client's circumstances mean we will never need to do one?

fields.name: RetirementCallNotNeededReason
fields.fieldText: Reason not needed

fields.name: Copy_1_of_ConfirmCompletePartnerReview
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Proceed to confirm you have resolved the comments and submit the narrative for partner review.

fields.name: ConfirmCompletePartnerReview
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Click next to confirm you have resolved the comments and submit the narrative for partner review.

fields.name: UndefinedAdviceMethodMessage
fields.fieldText: The advice method needs to be defined first. Please ask the planner to set this using the change advice method button.

fields.name: UnknownTaskMessage
fields.fieldText: The current task isn't managed through this widget. Please complete normally, or let the product team know if you think it should be.

fields.name: WriteCaseSummarySkipped
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Add your case summary to the specialist notes and notes for the risk call in the outstanding information field on the advice, then complete the task.

validationRule.errorMessage: Information not completed. If you think you have done this, click refresh and try again.

fields.name: WriteCaseSummary
fields.fieldText:
{!task.Subject}

Add your case summary to the specialist notes and notes for the risk call in the outstanding information field on the advice, then complete the task.

validationRule.errorMessage: Information not completed. If you think you have done this, click refresh and try again.

subflows.name: Call_flow_to_reassign_dedicated_specialist
subflows.label: Call flow to reassign dedicated specialist

subflows.name: Create_task_for_on_hold_LOAs
subflows.label: Create task for on hold LOAs

textTemplates.name: chatterPostMessageRetirementCall
textTemplates.text: @[{!advice.Advice_Household__r.OwnerId}], this household requires retirement call. The retirement call deck content can be accessed from the Retirement Call Deck URL field.

textTemplates.name: chatterPostMessageRetirementCallNotNeeded
textTemplates.text: @[{!advice.Advice_Household__r.OwnerId}], though this client is in or near retirement, no retirement call will be needed. Please check the retirement call section for more detail.

variables.description: The advice record that is being worked with.
variables.name: advice

variables.description: The advice type status record that applies for this advice given its current status.
variables.name: adviceTypeStatus
